website_summaries.verdict: With its gorgeous visuals, over 700 cars and 200 tracks, it’s a dream come true for hardcore racing fans.
pros: Features a gigantic garage of fully-customizable cars from a wide range of manufacturers, plenty of additional car packs for separate purchase, and stunning 4K graphics
You’ll always be able to find other players to race against over Xbox Live
cons: Although the VIP and Car Pass add-ons are primarily for people who think 700 cars isn’t enough, these add-ons are fairly pricy

customer_reviews.title: Hate saying this: Skip it

product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox One| Edition:StandardTHE ULTIMATE RACING EXPERIENCE. BUILT FOR 4K. The best-selling racing franchise on any platform this generation. Experience the thrill of motorsport at the limit with the most comprehensive, beautiful and authentic racing game ever made. Enjoy gorgeous graphics at 60fps and true 4K resolution in HDR.
